inputs.description: Input dataset, potentially with sub-brick and/or sub-range selectors
inputs.name: Input dataset

inputs.description: Dataset to be used as a mask. Only voxels with nonzero values in 'mset' will be averaged from 'dataset'. The mask dataset and the input dataset must have the same number of voxels.
inputs.name: Mask dataset

output-files.description: The result is a number printed to stdout
output-files.name: Standard output
